title: My entire comp freezes every time i get in game
body: So for the last billion times now my game gets all the way to loading up and in game and then my comp immediately freezes up completely. I've been AFK so many times now, i don't want to let people down and i just wanna enjoy a game. Any suggestions? Restarting my comp repeatedly isn't good for it either.

replies.body:
Right click the application and test compatibility.

Should fix.

It sounds like you're being affected by the Windows updates that went out and enabled *game DVR* inside the Windows Game Bar. I strongly recommend [disabling this feature](http://www.howtogeek.com/235474/how-to-roll-back-builds-and-uninstall-updates-on-windows-10/) to see if it resolves your issue.

Let me know if this helped.
